summary: An experienced and creative strategist in pre sales leadership with a successful record of organizing and managing for evolving companies for 17 years.  Successful as a team member and skilled leader with a concerted focus on achieving strategic team objectives by employing the theoretical concepts where and when needed.   Resourceful and easily adaptable tech executive with outstanding business and technical acumen.  Makes a difference with team members and customers.Adaptable, multifaceted and resourceful technological executive with outstanding business and technical insight, focused on obtaining objectives by working and using a team based approach to attain targeted and practical strategies.   With 5 years of managerial leadership in IT Operations and Software Pre sales.Specialties:   Software Pre Sales, Leadership, Sales Strategy, Value Selling, Consultative Selling, Game Theory, Cloud Computing and Virtualization Strategy, IT Strategy, Service Automation, SaaS, Data Center Architecture and Operations, ITIL v3 Foundation Certified.
